main.name: Utkarsh Nautiyal
main.shortDesc: Final-year CS student focused on real-world machine learning systems, cloud engineering, and full-stack development. Experienced in delivering scalable ML solutions and recognized in national-level coding contests and hackathons.

about.title: B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering
about.about: Final-year CS student focused on real-world machine learning systems, cloud engineering, and full-stack development. Experienced in delivering scalable ML solutions and recognized in national-level coding contests and hackathons.

projects.name: AutoAssign â€“ Automated Assignment Checker
projects.desc: Scalable grading system using Sentence-BERT for semantic scoring and MinHash+LSH for hybrid plagiarism detection. Achieved 92% accuracy and reduced manual grading time by 85%. Built with Flask and Docker.
projects.summary: Automated assignment grading tool leveraging ML for semantic scoring and plagiarism detection, streamlining the grading process.

projects.name: Quantum Antivirus
projects.desc: Cross-platform antivirus app combining ML (XGBoost/LightGBM) and quantum feature reduction using QUBO. Achieved 84% malware detection accuracy with a 30% performance boost. Built with Flutter and FastAPI.
projects.summary: AI-powered antivirus application utilizing quantum feature reduction for faster and more accurate malware detection.

projects.name: Fruit Quality Predictor
projects.desc: PyTorch model classifying fruit quality into 5 categories using fine-tuned ResNet-50 with attention layers. Achieved 86% accuracy and deployed using ONNX for edge devices.
projects.summary: Deep learning model for classifying fruit quality, optimized for edge deployment and real-time use.

projects.name: Trendbox
projects.desc: A React-based clothing fashion store. Modern e-commerce platform for clothing, built with React and Node.js. Features product browsing, cart, and checkout.
projects.summary: Modern e-commerce web app for fashion, offering seamless product browsing and shopping experience.

desc: Studied core CS subjects including Data Structures, Algorithms, Operating Systems, Computer Networks, and Software Engineering.
Specialized in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Cloud Computing.

Applied theory in real-world projects under faculty mentorship, contributed to research papers, and built scalable AI solutions using Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and cloud platforms like AWS and GCP.

awards: Ranked in Top 1% out of 50,000+ participants in Coding Ninjas World Cup 2023.
Secured 3rd Rank out of 400+ participants in Codezilla Coding Competition 2022, awarded 5000 cash prize.
Achieved 3rd Rank in Choose and Code Competition 2023, a DSA-based contest.
Secured 1st Rank in technical and behavioral rounds of Mock Interview Competition (Aarambh) 2024 organized by Codev Club.
certifications: Deep Learning Specialization by Andrew Ng
Machine Learning Specialization by Andrew Ng
Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) by Google Cloud
The Complete Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp, Udemy
AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials by Amazon Web Services
leadership: Led hands-on workshops in machine learning and cloud computing at Google Developer Club, empowering 100+ students to build and deploy AI models on AWS and GCP.
Core Member of Codevichar, mentoring peers in competitive programming and driving participation in coding contests, increasing club participation by 40%.
Finalist in a 24-hour Inter-College hackathon, developing an end-to-end AI-powered solution under high-pressure constraints, achieving Top 5 ranking out of 300+ teams.

desc: Worked under the mentorship of our ML professor to build real-world applications using machine learning.
Contributed to research papers on applied ML topics, focusing on practical deployment and optimization of models.
Led hands-on workshops in machine learning and cloud computing, empowering 100+ students to build and deploy Applications on AWS and GCP.
